Detailed Description

template<class OBJECT_TYPE, class FIND_POLICY = MessageHandlerFinder< OBJECT_TYPE >>
class StreamMessageHandlerEx< OBJECT_TYPE, FIND_POLICY >

Objects of this type are used to handle variable length messages destined for the cell app, a cell or a space.

They simply pass all the mercury parameters to the handler function.
